text: The 2010 Tour of Turkey was the 46th edition of professional road bicycle racing Tour of Turkey. ==Stages== ===Stage 1: 11 April 2010: İstanbul (prologue), 5.8 km=== {| |Stage 1 results {| class="wikitable" |- !
